resources.string:
This process consists of the following three steps:

  1.  Entering some data from your document;
  2.  Reading data from your document;
  3.  Issuing the credential.

During the final process, your name, date and place of birth will be transmitted to the enrollment server, but these will not be stored by the server.

Proceed?
This phone does not support NFC.
NFC is disabled. Please enable NFC in the phone settings before using this feature.
The issuing of the credential failed.
Could not connect to the enrollment server.
The server encountered a problem and aborted.
The enrollment server returned an invalid response.
Failed to establish contact with the passport.
Failed to establish contact with the driving license.
The document data you supplied seems to be wrong.
You cannot enroll with an expired identity document.
Please select the identity document you wish to use, and provide the requested data to allow the app to communicate with the document.
You don\'t have any credentials yet.

plurals.name: disclose_question_1
plurals.item: The following attribute will be sent to the verifier.
The following attributes will be sent to the verifier.

plurals.name: disclose_question_named
plurals.item: The following attribute will be sent to the verifier %s.
The following attributes will be sent to the verifier %s.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to disclose these attributes?
The following message will be signed:
The following message will be signed and sent to %s:
Are you sure you want to sign this message with these attributes?
Failed to establish contact with drivers license
View, add or remove scheme managers
Enter the URL of the scheme manager
For each of the categories listed below, the verifier accepts one of the following attributes. The icons indicate if you do or do not have this attribute.

The issuer has requested that you disclose some attributes before the issuance can take place. For each of the categories listed below, it accepts one of the following attributes. The icons indicate if you do or do not have this attribute (and if it has the appropriate value, if applicable).

A problem occurred when attempting to read your attributes from storage. In order to prevent your attributes from being lost, you should exit the app now. If you press continue, your attributes will be lost.
Whether or not to allow screenshots to be made
An issuer wants to issue the following attributes to you.
Issuer %s wants to issue the following attributes to you.
However, the following attributes will be sent to the issuer during issuance.
Disclose these attributes and continue issuance?
Are you sure you want to delete this credential? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete all attributes?
Are you certain you want to remove this scheme manager? This renders all credentials that you might have that fall under the authority of this scheme manager unusable.
This scheme manager cannot be added because it is already known.
Are you certain that you want to add the scheme manager "%s"?
You will need to register to it with your email address and your PIN.
Downloading of the scheme manager failed. Error: %s
Failed to communicate with passport (could not read AA public key)
Scan the QR image on your Driver\'s License.
The verifier requires attributes of the following kind: %s but you do not have the appropriate attributes.
The request cannot be processed because the scheme manager \"%s\" is not installed.
Could not download credential or issuer information

You already have instances of the following credentials:

%s
You can have at most one of these credentials. Continuing will overwrite the ones you already have.

Proceed?
The scheme manager "%s" has been successfully installed.
PIN must be at least 5 digits

To use credentials associated to the %s scheme manager, you need to enter your email address and a PIN code to register with its MyIRMA website.
Important: Carefully remember your PIN! You will need to enter it each time you use attributes from this scheme manager. If you forget it, your attributes become unusable.

Please provide a personal e-mail address.
You will receive an e-mail with a link at the provided address. After clicking on this link you will get this e-mail address as your first attribute. You can use this attribute to login to MyIRMA.

Chosen e-mail: %s

Please choose a PIN.

Important: Carefully remember your PIN! You will need to enter it each time you use the IRMA app. If you forget it, all your attributes become unusable and you will have to redo this registration.

A confirmation link has been sent to the address:

%s

Click on the link in the email to continue registration.
Finish registration by clicking on the link that has been sent to your email address.
Your credentials are unusable because your account has been blocked at your MyIRMA account.
Your credentials are temporarily unusable because your account has been blocked at your MyIRMA account. You can try again in
Your registration to MyIRMA is not yet complete. Have you clicked on the activation link sent to your email address?
Could not connect to the MyIRMA server.
The email address %s is already in use. Please choose another one.
With the IRMA Android app you can receive, manage and disclose your personal attributes.\n\nVersion %s

This credential contains your MyIRMA login attribute, and cannot be deleted on its own.\n\nIf you really want to, you can instead delete all attributes using the menu in the main screen. This will also unregister you from MyIRMA.

plurals.item: PIN Incorrect! You have one try left.
PIN Incorrect! You have %d tries left.
